properties.areaDesc: East Santa Barbara Channel from Pt. Conception to Pt. Mugu CA including Santa Cruz Island
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 4 at 3:06AM PST until February 4 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts to 35 kt and
combined seas 6 to 8 feet this morning.

* WHERE...East Santa Barbara Channel from Pt. Conception to Pt.
Mugu CA including Santa Cruz Island.

* WHEN...Until noon PST today.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will create dangerous sea conditions
which could capsize or damage small and large vessels.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gale Force Winds will be confined to
eastern portions of the Santa Barbara Channel.
See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY
